TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyInfoX509Data extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

summary.span: 表示 XMLDSIG 或 XML 加密 元素的 子元素。

span.span: Represents an subelement of an XMLDSIG or XML Encryption element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 `` 元素，该元素包含与验证或加密密钥相关的 x.509v3 证书信息。The class represents the `` element that contains X.509v3 certificate information related to the validation or encryption key. 例如，一个 `` 元素可能包含一个 x.509 证书，该证书的使用者公钥为验证密钥，或在验证密钥的证书中终止的 x.509 证书链或相关的 x.509 证书的其他标识符。For example, an `` element might contain an X.509 certificate whose subject public key is the validation key, or a chain of X.509 certificates that terminate in a certificate for the validating key, or other identifiers for related X.509 certificates. 每当需要在加密或签名的 XML 文档中包含 x.509 证书数据时，请使用类。Use the class whenever you need to include X.509 certificate data in an encrypted or signed XML document. 有关元素的详细信息 `` ，请参阅 W3C 网站上提供的 [XMLDSIG 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/) 的4.4.4 部分或 [XML 加密规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)。For more information about the `` element, see Section 4.4.4 of the [XMLDSIG specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/) or the [XML Encryption specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/), which are available on the W3C website. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何使用分离的签名对 XML 文件进行签名。The first example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using a detached signature. 第二个示例演示如何使用信封签名对 XML 文件进行签名。The second example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using an envelope signature. **示例 #1****Example #1** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/CPP/examplecreatedetached.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/CS/examplecreatedetached.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/VB/examplecreatedetached.vb#1)] **示例 #2****Example #2** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/CPP/examplecreateenvelope.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/CS/examplecreateenvelope.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/VB/examplecreateenvelope.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何使用分离的签名对 XML 文件进行签名。The first example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using a detached signature. 第二个示例演示如何使用信封签名对 XML 文件进行签名。The second example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using an envelope signature. **示例 #1****Example #1** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/CPP/examplecreatedetached.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/CS/examplecreatedetached.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/VB/examplecreatedetached.vb#2)] **示例 #2****Example #2** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/CPP/examplecreateenvelope.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/CS/examplecreateenvelope.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/VB/examplecreateenvelope.vb#2)]

summary.span: 将指定的颁发者名称和序列号对添加到 对象中。

span.span: Adds the specified issuer name and serial number pair to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于标识，每个 x.509v3 证书都带有颁发证书的证书颁发机构的名称，该证书与证书颁发机构分配的唯一序列号配对。For identification, each X.509v3 certificate carries the name of the certification authority that issued the certificate paired with a unique serial number assigned by the certification authority. 方法将有关颁发者名称和序列号对的信息添加到可 通过属性访问的对象的列表中 。The method adds information about an issuer name and serial number pair to a list of objects that are accessible through the property.

summary.span: 将使用者密钥标识符 (SKI) 添加到 对象中。

span.span: Adds a subject key identifier (SKI) to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者密钥标识符 (滑雪板) 是标识包含特定公钥的证书的简便方法。Subject key identifiers (SKIs) are a shorthand way to identify certificates that contain a certain public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者密钥标识符 (滑雪板) 是标识包含特定公钥的证书的一种方法。Subject key identifiers (SKIs) are a way of identifying certificates that contain a certain public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的对象适合用作 XMLDSIG 或 XML 加密元素的子 `` 元素。The object returned by this method is suitable for use as a subelement of an XMLDSIG or XML encryption `` element.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IssuerSerials As ArrayList
public: property System::Collections::ArrayList ^ IssuerSerials { System::Collections::ArrayList ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示颁发者名称和序列号对的 结构的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of structures that represent an issuer name and serial number pair.

value.span: 表示颁发者名称和序列号对的 结构的列表。

span.span: A list of structures that represent an issuer name and serial number pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示 `` XML 数字签名的元素，该元素使用 中包含的结构的列表。The property represents the `` element of an XML digital signature using a list of structures contained within. ``元素表示颁发者名称和序列号对，用于标识特定的 x.509v3 证书。The `` element represents an issuer name and serial number pair, which identify a specific X.509v3 certificate. X.509 证书的颁发者是颁发证书的证书颁发机构的名称。The issuer of an X.509 certificate is the name of the certification authority that issued the certificate. 证书颁发机构分配每个证书颁发唯一的序列号。Certification authorities assign each certificate they issue a unique serial number. 您可以使用方法添加名称和序列号对 。You can add a name and serial number pair using the method.

summary.span: 获取包含在 对象中的使用者密钥标识符 (SKI) 的列表。

span.span: A list of the subject key identifiers (SKIs) contained in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者密钥标识符 (滑雪板) 是标识包含特定公钥的证书的一种方法。Subject key identifiers (SKIs) are a way to identify certificates that contain a certain public key. SKI 可用于标识颁发给特定使用者密钥对的一个或多个证书。An SKI can be used to identify one or more certificates issued to a particular subject key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 x.509v3 证书都包含一个使用者名称。Every X.509v3 certificate includes a subject name. 此名称可用于标识一个或多个证书。This name can be used to identify one or more certificates.
